Description:
ARCHITECTURALLY DESIGNED RESORT-STYLE HOME
CRANBOURNE - Architecturally designed family home teaming with warmth, contemporary comforts and lifestyle luxuries, this four-bedroom home will impress every member of the family with its stunning presentation, spacious dimensions and resort-style outdoor-entertaining area overlooking the swimming pool.
Double brick with timber-lined ceilings and high clerestory windows drawing in superb natural light, the residence boasts both formal and informal living and dining areas, each with high ceilings, wood fires and direct access to the deck.
A premium kitchen with stone waterfall island, chic tiled flooring, suite of quality stainless-steel appliances and bank of servery windows offers easy access through bifold doors to the covered alfresco area, which is sensational fit out with a wood fire, built-in barbecue and wine fridge to allow for exceptional entertaining as the kids make a splash in the pool.
Cradled down a separate hall, at the end of the day children will sleep soundly in a dedicated junior wing with two bedrooms and a lavish bathroom with dual vanities and a deep freestanding soaker tub, leaving parents to the private and serenity of the master bedroom with ensuite beside the fourth bedroom / home office.
Features:
- Architecturally designed home
- Resort-style poolside entertaining
- Cosy wood fire places
- Premium fittings and fixtures
- 7.5m Tradies garage  
- Second garage and carport
Just a stone's throw to Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, recreational facilities, a choice of schools and around 45-minutes' drive to Melbourne, this outstanding package includes a 7.5-metre tradie's garage and second garage with attached carport on a private 2,106m2 (approx) allotment in the bowl of a quiet court.
